data.name: Noun Town: VR Language Learning
data.detailed_description:
If you're interested in Noun Town: VR Language Learning, please wishlist and follow us :)



You can also join the game's community on Discord:

Learn a language, save the island!

An unknown force is draining the color from Noun Town. The scientists of Realia Labs believe the island‚Äôs native language holds the key to saving the worried citizens from a life in eternal grayscale.


They‚Äôve contracted you, an outsider, to test an innovative machine that turns knowledge into color. Explore the island, befriending locals and learning their language to bring the rainbow back to Noun Town.

üéÆ No grinding, just gaming

Immersing yourself in our expert-designed game world is the new best way to learn a language. Even testing your knowledge is fun, with 6 mini-games to check your progress.

üèÜ From beginner to winner

Start from scratch and build up 1,000+ words and phrases in Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, French, German, or Italian.

üîà Speak like a native

Interact with 16 unique characters over voice chat to nail down tricky pronunciations, removing the anxiety of slipping up when you practice in real life.

data.short_description: Noun Town: VR Language Learning is the new best way to learn a foreign language! Pick things up, listen, read, and speak your chosen language in a world that regains color as you learn. Test your skills with mini-games & talk to the local villagers. Learn Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, and more‚Ä¶

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
